Shows water-wind shift damage to porch/veranda roof during storm.
More water damage in roof/ceiling of porch/veranda area. Crack in truss due to stress is shown.
More damage to porch/veranda

Water damage to roofing.
Sress cracks on east wall and roofline
More stress cracks

Bill for 2 buffets and table. We replaced the more expensive all wood buffets (2) and wood table with these which were glass and bamboo. The damaged furniture was 3 years old. The table chairs were OK and will go with this set.
Our 3 year old rug and pad were destroyed. Although we chose to tile it now, this is the estimate for replacing the berber carpet and the cost of removing carpet and pad.
